objetos.descripcion: Glass filled with divine water, a popular drink among the nobles of the palace.
objetos.caracteristicas: It must be given to the Priest of the Mibu Village to receive Dragon Spring sake.

objetos.descripcion: Protective bell received from an old woman as an offering to Buddha.
objetos.caracteristicas: It must be offered to the Buddha statue in the Dilapidated Temple to access the Hirata Estate.

objetos.descripcion: Sacred passage on the path to enlightenment.
objetos.caracteristicas: Necessary item for the Return ending.

objetos.descripcion: Stone found on an altar in the depths of the village of the water-dwellers.
objetos.caracteristicas: It is one of the ingredients Kuro needs for the Abandonment of Immortality.

objetos.descripcion: Bottle of Ashina sake received from Emma. Sake is shared.
objetos.caracteristicas: It can be given to Isshin Ashina, the Sculptor, or Emma to obtain additional dialogue.
